name: "AUDREY" 2-colour Risograph print
description:
Space is the place with "Audrey" - my print for the RAWRSOME exhibition curated by Risosaurus Press, and on show at the Old Sweet Shop in Sheffield (until Jan 31st 2014).

2-colour risograph print
297mm x 420mm (A3)
Heavyweight Munken Pure paper (240gsm)
Signed/Numbered edition of 50
Free postage in the UK

First 5 orders get a special freebie! (see it at the link below)

More images at:
http://www.benjamincooney.com/2013/12/space-is-place-new-print-audrey-now.html

name: 31 DAYS original art
description:
All 31 original drawings that make up the 31 DAYS zine are up for grabs.

All are ink on card, 150mm x 210mm, and will be signed.

They can all be viewed at http://instagram.com/benlcooney
(all the drawings are in October 2013, and each one has a day number.  When they sell, I'll leave a SOLD comment on the pic.
If in doubt, get in touch to check availability.  Please include the day number or a description with the payment, thanks.)

Price per individual piece:
£10 inc p+p (UK)
£12 inc p+p (Worldwide)

First come first served!

All proceeds will go towards printing ISSUE 2 of TINNITUS!

Thanks.

name: 31 DAYS zine
description:
I took part in INKtober this year...I inked a drawing every day throughout October.

These 31 drawings have now been collected and published (by me) in a handy candy colour 'zine......'31 DAYS'.  When they were printed the different colours of paper were shuffled up, meaning no two copies are the same!

There's no specific theme (eyeballs seem to be a common occurrence mind)...pineal gods, predatory libidinous demons, miserable postmen, broken families, moon worshippers, weed wizards, fallen rock stars, pervy kittens.......whatever my brain felt like spilling onto the page at that moment in time.

There's some preview images at http://www.benjamincooney.com/2013/11/31-days-zine-out-now.html and you can see all the original inktober images at http://instagram.com/benlcooney (anything in October)

All proceeds will go towards printing ISSUE 2 of TINNITUS.

A5 zine
black on candy coloured paper!
32 pages plus 2 colour card cover

£3.00 inc p+p (£4.00 worldwide)

Open mind encouraged!

name: "Papa, Let's Eat More!" mini-comic/A4 poster
description:
A7 mini-comic that unfolds to reveal A4 poster.

A father and son take a trip...earthly delights...celestial visions...birth...death...

Blue risograph print on cream paper.
Signed and numbered edition of 106.
Comes with bonus "this is NOT the new issue of TINNITUS" card.

Preview images at www.benjamincooney.com
There is a punchline element to the comic, so if you don't wanna spoil it for yourself, don't look!

name: TINNITUS comic No.1
description:
First issue proper of TINNITUS comic.
All drawn by me.
Stories about schizoid siblings, old friends, cruddy jobs, coffee, hippies, german psyche bands...

A5 comic.
24 heavyweight black, white & grey printed pages plus card cover.
Comes wrapped in a handpressed linoprint dustjacket.
Signed & numbered edition of 108.

FREE issue zero with every order!

The first FIVE web orders I receive will also receive an extra alternative screenprint/ink dustjacket!

Visit benjamincooney.com for a look inside!
